data.title: Sir John Maxwell, 12th of Pollock
data.meta_description: Genealogy for John Maxwell of Pollock, Knight (b. - 1593)  family tree on Geni, with over 260 million profiles of ancestors and living relatives.
data.text:
SIR JOHN MAXWELL OF POLLOCK

Genealogical Accounts

William Fraser, Memoirs of the Maxwells of Pollock, Vol. I. Memoirs & Charters (Edinburgh 1863), 497 pp.

William Fraser, Memoirs of the Maxwells of Pollock, Vol. II. Correspondence (Edinburgh 1863), 453 pp.

Biographical Summary

"Sir John Maxwell of Pollock, was knighted by king James VI. and got charter under the great seal, of several lands and baronies in Renfrewshire, anno 1587...

...He married Margaret, daughter of William Cunningham of Caprington, by whom he had a son an daughter...

...He was killed assisting his chief the lord Maxwell, anno 1593, and was succeeded by his son."

SOURCE: The Baronage of Scotland, Robert Douglas, 1798, page 421

From http://www.thepeerage.com/p30271.htm#i302710

Sir John Maxwell of Pollok1

M, #302710, d. 7 December 1593

Last Edited=6 Mar 2012

Consanguinity Index=3.14%

Sir John Maxwell of Pollok is the son of Sir John Maxwell of Cowglen and Elizabeth Maxwell of Pollok.2 He married, firstly, Margaret Cuninghame, daughter of William Cuninghame, 5th of Caprington and Agnes Hamilton, in 1569.2 He and Marjory Edmonstone obtained a marriage license on 17 September 1592.2 He died on 7 December 1593 at Lockerbie, Dumfries-shire, Scotland, killed in action.2 He fought in the Battle of Lockerby on 7 December 1593, a Johnstone victory in feud between that family and the Maxwells.2

Children of Sir John Maxwell of Pollok and Margaret Cuninghame

Agnes Maxwell+1

Sir John Maxwell of Pollok, 1st and last Bt.2 d. 1 Nov 1647

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 1564. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]
